short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily store your travel funds and vouchers from all airlines. Copy your travel fund codes when booking your next flight.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever gotten a refund for a flight only to forget to use the voucher they gave you that stuck in your inbox somewhere? Have you ever been given a voucher for taking the next flight, but it expired by the time you remembered to use it?

Flight funds makes it easy for you to keep track of your travel vouchers, funds, gift certificates provided by the airlines that you use. We will keep you informed of upcoming expirations, so that you never not use one due to it expiring. 

When using our extension, we make it very simple to find the funds that you have previously received and copy the record identifier, so that you can apply them when purchasing flights at various airline websites.
